ingredients.content: 15 - 29 oz canned butter beans, rinsed and drained (approx. 8.5 oz direct weight)
3 ½ oz red bell peppers, quartered
3 ½ oz green bell peppers, quartered
2 ½ oz black olives, drained, pitted and halved

preparations.content: Place drained beans into a large serving bowl and set aside.

Place peppers, onions, olives, oil, vinegar and salt into mixing bowl and chop <b>6-8 sec/speed 4<b>. Transfer chopped vegetables to reserved beans and mix well with spatula. Serve or refrigerate until needed.
